item.title: Programming Facts
item.author: Boda Sadallah
item.description: Intro this is intended to be some kind or reference to go through whenever I face some kind of bug, or error, that I don’t know how to solve.usually these kinds of error that doesn’t make sense, or we don’t know the cause of them, and the worst it, that we don’t find many ppl facing the same issue, so internet can’t be so useful then. I learned theses facts the hard way, spending so much time trying to figure out the root of the issue.
